item.title: TimeLines
item.description: Ideas are too important to die. We need a way to preserve them, protect them, and free them from megacorps/EULAs. Enter Timelines.

item.title: About
item.description: memkit is the brainchild of three founder friends that met at ETHDenver in 2023 Stanislav Srednyak and David West met during BUIDLweek and had a conversation that would mark the Genesis of Timelines, their first product. With the help of Forest Kunecke they smashed together their first prototype.
